name: Hugo: The Quest for the Sunstones
description:
Hugo: The Quest for the Sunstones is a 3D platform game similar to Crash Bandicoot both in graphics style and gameplay.

Scylla and Don Croco have placed a giant boulder in the crater of a volcano - this puts the Kikurians and their village in danger. To thwart this evil plan, Hugo has to collect three magic Sunstones and place them in the right way. With the sun shining through them, the boulder can be destroyed and the Kikurians and their village can be saved.

Gameplay includes defeating enemies by hitting them like Indiana Jones with your whip. These include various jungle animals, plants and mummies. Along the way diamonds can be collected.
